title: VR-Based Blended Learning Course for Cultivating Nature-Friendliness and Environmental Attitudes in Gifted Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (fractions, ratios) and awareness of environmental issues
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing environmental problem-solving by leveraging gifted students' mathematical thinking. Constructs participatory learning environments integrating VR technology and gamification elements

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of ocean acidification on ecosystems using mathematical data (ratios, graphs) through VR simulations.
Learners can design environmental problem-solving projects linked to Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) in blended learning environments.
Learners can apply mathematical modeling (equations, optimization) to induce environmentally protective behaviors through VR-based escape games.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
